services:
Home Assure Plus
The Right Solutions For The Right Reasons
HOME ASSURE PLUS is an exclusive set of eight services offered by 4Sight Inspections and is included with every Home Inspection at no extra charge. You will not find this level of commitment or confidence in Home Inspection Service anywhere else.

A sample of what HOME ASSURE PLUS provides:
Re-visit*
If repairs are negotiated as a direct result of the inspection performed and the inspection report provided by 4Sight Inspections we will revisit the property at your request and at a mutually convenient time to re-inspect the contractually repaired components to ensure the repair is complete and satisfactory.

Walk-a-way***
If there are major concerns found with the inspected house that cause you to walk away from the purchase agreement I will inspect the next home you place an offer on at half price. i.e. if second home had a rate of $375 then you would only pay $185.

30 Day Warranty
We offer a 30 Day Warranty for structural and mechanical components in the home at no extra charge. 

We provide home inspections, professional home inspectors, certified home inspectors, home inspection guarantee and the best home inspection service in the industry.

profile:
Due To The Covid-19 Pandemic, 

Wallbank Home Inspections Have Implemented The Government of Canada COVID-19 Recommendations To Our Normal Process Of A Home Inspection To Ensure The Health & Safety Of Our Home Inspectors, Clients, Friends & Family.

We At Wallbank Home Inspections Take Your Safety Seriously, Our Inspectors Wear New Masks, Gloves & Sanitize All Equipment Prior & After Leaving Your Home.
Our Inspectors Are Double Vaccinated + Booster, Experienced, Detailed & Provide First Class Customer Service.

We Respect Your Privacy, Your Family And Your Home, We Also Remove Our Boots At The Front Door! 

We Keep Our Findings In Perspective, The Inspection Usually Lasts 2 1/2 Hours, It Will Consist Of Physically Inspecting And Reporting On The Condition Of The Systems And Components Of The Home. This Consists Of The Structural Foundation, Roof, Exterior, Electrical, Heating & Cooling, Plumbing, Insulation, Ventilation, And Interior Of The Home.

We Love Questions! Lets Discuss Your Next Project!

Thank You For Visiting,

Wallbank Home Inspections
416.930.5139
kevin@wallbankinspections.com
www.wallbankinspections.com

profile:
A professional inspection will significantly reduce your risk and help make the entire home buying process easier and less stressful. Legacy Home Inspections really enjoys helping our clients. In this process, customer service is our highest priority.

Legacy Home Inspections is an independently owned and operated home inspection business. We offer the highest quality of customer service in the industry. With more than 19 years of experience in the construction and home inspection industry we have performed thousands of inspections since 2004. We have the experience, training and knowledge, to provide you with the security and peace of mind you are looking for. We are proud to be your inspection service provider. Whether you are buying or selling, we can help you through the whole process with confidence. A home is the single largest investment and asset that most people own. We offer a premium service with detailed and unbiased reports to ensure that you have an accurate understanding of the subject property. We strive to continually raise the bar in the building inspection industry.

We offer more than just a look into our client's home, we also want to ensure that you know your home. Our goal is to have you understand your property. Our home inspections are intended to educate by giving you a needed understanding of the property, an overview of how the systems in the home work, how the systems of the home work in conjunction with each other, and how they should be maintained throughout the change of seasons and over the years.

Why choose Legacy Home Inspections? Because we care.

profile: Dive Deep Home Inspections is a residential home inspection company made up of Certified Home Inspectors who have residential construction and renovation experience. Inspectors who know how the systems of your home should actually function. Your home is the largest investment you will make in you lifetime. Whether you are just looking to buy, preparing to sell the one you have, or maybe just looking to make sure its well maintained, let us have a look. Dive Deep Home Inspections only works with Certified Home Inspectors who have past residential construction or renovation experience. We know homes from the ground up. A proper home inspection, sometimes called a Field Performance Review, consists of a visual inspection and tests using the standard operating controls, of the major systems in your home. Systems which include roofing, structure, exterior, interior and insulation, plumbing, electrical, and of course your heating and air conditioning. Don't trust such a detailed inspection to just anyone. Our certified and experienced inspectors know how these systems should function. All inspections are documented in a report, that includes full colour pictures, and diagrams and links that help you to understand your inspectors findings. Your report comes to you by email within 24 hours and you will have access to your inspectors for as long as you need for questions and/or explanations. Let us Dive Deep into your home!

profile:
Homeworks Inspector will reduce the risk of unwanted surprises. Your Inspector will provide you with information regarding repairs and any defects with the home. He can help you with regular maintenance suggestions, and as a Homeworks Client our inspection team is available for calls regarding any questions you have for as long as you own your home.
 
Homeworks inspection services inspectors adhere to the strict standards of practice and the code of conduct of the Canadian Association of Home and Property Inspectors, the Ontario Association of Home Inspectors, as well as the International Association of Certified Home Inspectors.
  
HomeWorks inspector will provide you with valuable information regarding the roofing, exterior, structure, heating, cooling, insulation, plumbing, and the interior of your perspective real estate purchase or sale.
